name: The Swolely Grail
description:
God calls you to his gym.

Go UP UP UP to his domain!

Can you become worthy of being godly jacked?

  • Lift weights to become swollen
  • Use threadmill to increase your stamina
  • Can looking at your sexy self increase your strength?
  • Will you ascend to the God's gym itself?

CONTROLS:

WASD - move

ZXC - push it to the limit

C - Select/Skip

Red bar is your stamina

White bar is your chalk'iness

Minigames:

  • Tap tap tap! Treadmill is about tapping to increase your stamina.
  • Chalk?  It's surely not that importat.
  • Legpress. Press only when the bar is in the box. The faster you go the easier it gets!
  • Core. Use buttons to balance the bar and strenghten those abs
  • Mirror? Press the letter that appears on the screen to flex your muscles. (Bro's say it's twice as effective as other excersises)
  • Winners don't use drugs! Or do they.... It's like a dice - you win some, you loose some

After three minutes of intense training, you'll become ripped an shredded.

Then the God will ask you to prove yourself by lifting the holy weight. Don't just stand there! There really isn't an easteregg. Get to work!

When lifting the Holy Weights smash Z and C to press as hard as you can. Don't forget, your stamina isn't infinite...

So? Are you up for the challange? Are you worthy of entering God's gym? And why didn't you bring any clothes for your new body? Jeeez, cover it up...

TEAM

Programming: Charles?

Art: Rachel

Sfx and tunes: Rous

QA+Design: Tom

It was a great! We got so much done and we are really proud of our first creation. Hope to see you on other gamejams (fistbump)

Coded in Javascript using p5.js and p5.play libraries.

Destiny awaits you
